title: GANGSTAAA (GLS CLASS)
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Oh, in mei'm Brustkorb, Baby, brennt was
lines.translation: Oh, something's burning in my chest, baby.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Denn ich bin in mei'm Herz weich, in mein' Kopf ein Gangster
lines.translation: Because I'm soft in my heart, but a gangster in my head.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich glaub, ich muss fort, schau dir die Welt an
lines.translation: I think I need to leave, look at the world
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich vermisse die Zeit, wo ein Mensch noch ein Mensch war
lines.translation: I miss the time when a person was still a person.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: (Ich fahr) lonely in der GLS-Class
lines.translation: (I'm traveling) lonely in the GLS class
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: (Ich) smoke Weed, damit ich hier wegkann
lines.translation: (I) smoke weed so I can get away from here
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: (Babygirl) love me, gib mir bitte etwas
lines.translation: (Babygirl) love me, please give me something
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich bin mei'm Herz weich, in mein' Kopf ein Gangster
lines.translation: My heart is soft, but my head is a gangster.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Mein Kopf ist gefickt, Baby, frag nicht
lines.translation: My head is fucked, baby, don't ask.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Nein, soft reicht nicht, ich will hart geh'n
lines.translation: No, soft isn't enough, I want to go hard.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ein Toast auf gefallne Soldaten
lines.translation: A toast to fallen soldiers
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ein Toast darauf, dass ich noch da bin
lines.translation: A toast to the fact that I'm still here!
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Voller Narben, doch es ist egal
lines.translation: Covered in scars, but it doesn't matter.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Denn niemand intressiert sich für deine Probleme, solang sie eigene haben, ah
lines.translation: Because nobody cares about your problems as long as they have their own, ah
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich bin allein, kann nicht schlafen (no sleep)
lines.translation: I'm alone, I can't sleep.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wir dreh'n uns im Kreis bis zum Wahnsinn (oh, oh)
lines.translation: We're going in circles until we go insane (oh, oh)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich hab keine Reply auf deine Fragen
lines.translation: I have no reply to your questions
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich will das nicht erst seit gestern, sondern schon seit Jahren
lines.translation: I haven't just wanted this since yesterday, but for years.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Die Schönheit liegt verborgen in dem, was wir nicht sagen
lines.translation: Beauty lies hidden in what we don't say.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Aber Menschen heutzutage wollen nicht sparen
lines.translation: But people nowadays don't want to save money.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Nicht mit ihrer Meinung und auch nicht Worten (no)
lines.translation: Not with their opinion and not with words (no)
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Fick dein'n Podcast, ich geb einen Fick auf deine Normen
lines.translation: Fuck your podcast, I don't give a fuck about your standards
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Viele aus kaputten Lebensform'n sind von ihr'm Weg gekomm'n
lines.translation: Many from broken life forms have come from their path.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Hast du das Hungern satt, dann willst du auch Filet Mignon
lines.translation: If you're tired of starving, then you'll also want filet mignon.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sie erleben keine Bindung, sie hatten kein Telekom
lines.translation: They experience no connection, they had no telecommunications service
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Sie konnten sich nie ändern, sie waren keine Chamäleons
lines.translation: They could never change; they were not chameleons.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich muss vorankomm'n, Baby, ich muss ankomm'n
lines.translation: I gotta move forward, baby, I gotta arrive.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich will weg hier, frag mich nicht, wie lang schon
lines.translation: I want to get out of here, don't ask me how long I've been here.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Ich bin der Main-Charakter in meiner Handlung
lines.translation: I am the main character in my story.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Doch viel länger kann ich mir das nicht antun
lines.translation: But I can't put up with this much longer.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Zieh ich durch oder werf ich das Handtuch?
lines.translation: Do I persevere or do I throw in the towel?
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Hör ich auf die Zweifel, dann lass ich die Angst zu
lines.translation: If I listen to my doubts, then I allow myself to feel fear.
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Wenn du einmal genauer hinsiehst, kannst du
lines.translation: If you look more closely, you can
lines.grammar: German line; standard SVO word order and typical separable prefixes if present.

lines.text: Seh'n, es ist nicht schön, wenn du ranzoomst
lines.translation: Look, it's not pretty when you zoom in.
